title: System Model
description: High-level system information about the device. [System Model Documentation](../docs/messages/system.md)

description.description: Generic human-readable text describing the device

device_version.description: Version of schema supported by the device

zone.description: Aggregation of spaces, partial spaces or other zones that the device is serving

location.description: Properties of the expected physical location of the device

site.description: The site name according to the site model in which the device is installed in

panel.description: The reference of the panel where the device is installed in

floor_seq.description: Sequential integer representation for a floor, primarily for comparisons when non integer floors are used, e.g. 1 and 1M

x.description: The `x` coordinate of the device location in a project specific coordinate system

y.description: The `y` coordinate of the device location in a project specific coordinate system

z.description: The `z` (height) coordinate of the device location in a project specific coordinate system

lat.description: The `latitude` coordinate of the device in the WGS84 coordinate system

long.description: The `longitude` coordinate of the device in the WGS84 coordinate system

alt_m.description: The `altitude` coordinate of the device in meters

serial_no.description: The serial number of the physical device

software.description: A collection of items which can be used to describe version of software running on a device

physical_tag.description: Information used to print a physical QR code label.

min_loglevel.description: The minimum loglevel for reporting log messages below which log entries should not be sent. Default to 300.

metrics_rate_sec.description: The rate at which the system should send system event updates. 0 indicates no updates.
